1: I have been very emotionally upset when reminded of a trauma (like becoming very scared, angry, sad, afraid, etc.
2: I have been making efforts to avoid situations, activities or places that remind me of a trauma
3: There are any important parts of a trauma that I still can't remember
4: I have felt distant or cut off from other around me.
5: I had upsetting thoughts or images about a trauma that came into my head when I didn't want them to
6: I have felt emotionally numb (for example, feel sad but can't cry, unable to have loving feelings
7: I have felt that any future plans or hopes have changed because of a trauma
8: I am having problems falling or staying asleep
9: I am having nightmares or bad dreams about a trauma
10: I have been more irritable or having outbreaks of anger
11: I am having more difficulty concentrating (like losing track of a story on television, moving in and out of conversations, difficulty in remembering what I have read)
12: I have been trying not to think about or have feelings associated with the trauma
13: I have found that I am not interested in things that I used to enjoy doing
14: I had the experience of reliving a trauma, acting or feeling as if it were happening again
15: I am having physical reaction (like fast heart beats, break out in a sweat) when reminded of a trauma
16: I have been overly alert (for example, checking to see who is around me, uncomfortable with your back to a door, etc)
17: You have been alert or jumpier more easily (like when someone wakes behind you)
